name: Quick Chat Buttons: Chat with your website visitors via popular messaging apps
author: Klaxon.app

sections.description:
Chat with your website visitors via their favorite messaging app like whatsapp, facebook messenger, twitter, phone, sms and many other channels

Show sticky group of buttons on the bottom of your website to communicate with your website visitors.

  • Get more leads and calls
  • Stay available 24*7 for customer support
  • Increase customer satisfaction ratio

Select from 15 popular channels

  1. Whatsapp or Whatsapp Business
  2. Facebook Messenger
  3. Viber
  4. Line
  5. Mail
  6. Telegram
  7. Vkontakte
  8. SMS
  9. Phone
  10. WeChat
  11. Skype
  12. Snapchat
  13. Linkedin
  14. Twitter
  15. Waze

Quick Chat Buttons is GDPR complaint

We don’t store any local data about your visitors. Any time your visitors click on any of your the channels buttons, We will forward the website visitor to the relevant platform without saving any local data about it.
sections.installation:
1. Upload quick-chat-buttons.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Will Quick Chat Buttons work with any theme and page builder?

Yes! Quick Chat Buttons works great with all themes and page builders including Elementor, Divi, Visual Composer, WPBakery, Beaver, SiteOrigin, Gutenberg, WooCommerce and more

Does Quick Chat Buttons work on mobile?

Yes! Chat buttons will show up on each device (desktop/mobile)
sections.changelog:
1.0.4

  • New UI
  • Page Targeting (Pro)
  • Days and Time Selection (Pro)
  • Date and Time Selection (Pro)

1.0.3

  • Trigger after seconds
  • Trigger on page scroll

1.0.2

  • New Channels
  • Attention Effects
  • Show/Hide channel on Desktop/Mobile
  • Multiple CTA Icons

1.0.1

New Features:
– Vertical/Horizontal View
– Chat Bubble
– Stats: Click to View/Hover to View/Default Open
– Custom Position

1.0.0

Initial launch
